summary:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale=""><Summary language-id="en_US"><p>Meet Liferay developers and IT professionals to the fifth Liferay DEVCON in Amsterdam! Talk with Liferay engineers from around the world and gain valuable insights for your Liferay projects. Get answers to your questions, learn about new features and use the opportunity to help shape the Liferay community and development in a unique way. You can look forward to a lot of time to exchange knowledge, networking and fun.<br />
&nbsp;<br />
This year we offer on October 4, the day before the DEVCON, a UnConference as a special highlight. Here the participants build the agenda at the beginning in a plenary session. The UnConference offers a special environment for knowledge sharing and targeted exchange with peers.</p>

<p>Seats for DEVCON and Unconference are limited. Don't miss to register soon at <a href="http://www.liferay.com/devcon" target="_blank">www.liferay.com/devcon</a></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p></Summary></root>
summaryCurrentValue:
Meet Liferay developers and IT professionals to the fifth Liferay DEVCON in Amsterdam! Talk with Liferay engineers from around the world and gain valuable insights for your Liferay projects. Get answers to your questions, learn about new features and use the opportunity to help shape the Liferay community and development in a unique way. You can look forward to a lot of time to exchange knowledge, networking and fun.
 
This year we offer on October 4, the day before the DEVCON, a UnConference as a special highlight. Here the participants build the agenda at the beginning in a plenary session. The UnConference offers a special environment for knowledge sharing and targeted exchange with peers.

Seats for DEVCON and Unconference are limited. Don't miss to register soon at www.liferay.com/devcon

summary: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale=""><Summary language-id="en_US"><a href="https://www.liferay.com/web/events-symposium-north-america">Liferay Symposium</a> is moving to Austin, TX in Fall 2017! Join us as we gather industry leaders and key engineers from around the world. This is one of the few opportunities to speak with Liferay's key developers and experts. Learn from practical sessions and workshops, and discover best practices and innovative solutions for the business challenges you're focused on solving.</Summary></root>

summary:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Summary language-id="en_US">Unter dem aktuellen Motto „<strong>TOGETHER RELOADED: Wie IT und Business die digitale Transformation gemeinsam meistern</strong>” laden wir ein Jahr nach der Markteinführung der Liferay Digital Experience Platform (DXP) Interessenten, Kunden und Partner aus <strong>Deutschland</strong>, <strong>Österreich</strong> und der <strong>Schweiz</strong> herzlich zum <a href="https://www.liferay.com/web/events-ldsf-dach/home">Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF)</a> ein.&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;<br />
Das LDSF im Überblick:
<ul>
	<li>Umfangreicher Erfahrungsaustausch mit Liferay Experten, Kunden und Partnern</li>
	<li>Vorträge, Ausstellung und verschiedene Networking-Formate an einem Ort vereint</li>
	<li>Mehr als 40 Sessions rund um Liferay DXP, digitale Trends und Strategien, IT Operations und eine optimierte Customer Experience</li>
	<li>„Liferay DXP zum Anfassen” in zahlreichen Live-Demos</li>
	<li>Keynotes von Liferay Executives und Praxisvorträge der Liferay Kunden</li>
	<li>Intensiver Wissensaustausch in Expert Exchanges und einem Barcamp</li>
	<li>Welcome Reception und exklusiver Zugang zur historischen Fahrzeughalle der BMW Group Classic</li>
</ul>

<p>Melden Sie sich am besten noch heute mit Frühbucherrabatt an!</p></Summary></root>
summaryCurrentValue:
Unter dem aktuellen Motto „TOGETHER RELOADED: Wie IT und Business die digitale Transformation gemeinsam meistern” laden wir ein Jahr nach der Markteinführung der Liferay Digital Experience Platform (DXP) Interessenten, Kunden und Partner aus Deutschland, Österreich und der Schweiz herzlich zum Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF) ein. 
 
Das LDSF im Überblick:
  • Umfangreicher Erfahrungsaustausch mit Liferay Experten, Kunden und Partnern
  • Vorträge, Ausstellung und verschiedene Networking-Formate an einem Ort vereint
  • Mehr als 40 Sessions rund um Liferay DXP, digitale Trends und Strategien, IT Operations und eine optimierte Customer Experience
  • „Liferay DXP zum Anfassen” in zahlreichen Live-Demos
  • Keynotes von Liferay Executives und Praxisvorträge der Liferay Kunden
  • Intensiver Wissensaustausch in Expert Exchanges und einem Barcamp
  • Welcome Reception und exklusiver Zugang zur historischen Fahrzeughalle der BMW Group Classic

Melden Sie sich am besten noch heute mit Frühbucherrabatt an!
title: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Title language-id="en_US">Liferay Digital Solutions Forum DACH</Title></root>

MarketingEventSessionTypes.title: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Title language-id="en_US">Experts Exchange</Title></root>
MarketingEventSessionTypes.name: Experts Exchange

summary:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US," default-locale=""><Summary language-id="en_US"><p style="color: rgb(80, 0, 80); font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12.8px; margin-bottom: 1em;">
<style type="text/css">p.p1 {margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px; font: 12.0px Helvetica}
</style>
</p>

<p class="p1">Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF) is the annual event for anyone involved in (or looking at)&nbsp;Liferay. It's the best time to hear company's digital transformation stories first hand, to discuss your latest business challenges and connect with the enterprise develpment community. This year LDSF 2017 will be packed with new content including:</p>

<ul>
	<li class="p1">Keynotes from &lt;b&gt;HP Enterprise&lt;/b&gt; and&nbsp;&lt;b&gt;Forrester&lt;/b&gt;.</li>
	<li class="p1">Case studies from &lt;b&gt;Degussa Bank&lt;b&gt;, &lt;b&gt;Knowledge Hub&lt;/b&gt;</li>
	<li class="p1">Expert Panels on &lt;b&gt;GDPR for customer data&lt;/b&gt;, &lt;b&gt;Transforming financial services CX&lt;/b&gt; and &lt;b&gt;DevOps&lt;/b&gt;.</li>
	<li class="p1">Roundtables on &lt;b&gt;mobile&lt;/b&gt;, &lt;b&gt;customer experience design&lt;/b&gt;, &lt;b&gt;content management strategies&lt;/b&gt;, &lt;b&gt;GDPR&lt;/b&gt;.</li>
	<li class="p1">Technical sessions with Liferay experts on &lt;b&gt;Docker deployment&lt;/b&gt;, &lt;b&gt;automated testing pipelines&lt;/b&gt; and &lt;b&gt;headless CMS for AR / VR&lt;/b&gt;.</li>
	<li class="p1">Liferay &lt;b&gt;product roadmap updates&lt;/b&gt; and new developments</li>
</ul>

<p class="p1">&nbsp;</p></Summary></root>
summaryCurrentValue:
Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF) is the annual event for anyone involved in (or looking at) Liferay. It's the best time to hear company's digital transformation stories first hand, to discuss your latest business challenges and connect with the enterprise develpment community. This year LDSF 2017 will be packed with new content including:

  • Keynotes from <b>HP Enterprise</b> and <b>Forrester</b>.
  • Case studies from <b>Degussa Bank<b>, <b>Knowledge Hub</b>
  • Expert Panels on <b>GDPR for customer data</b>, <b>Transforming financial services CX</b> and <b>DevOps</b>.
  • Roundtables on <b>mobile</b>, <b>customer experience design</b>, <b>content management strategies</b>, <b>GDPR</b>.
  • Technical sessions with Liferay experts on <b>Docker deployment</b>, <b>automated testing pipelines</b> and <b>headless CMS for AR / VR</b>.
  • Liferay <b>product roadmap updates</b> and new developments
title: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale=""><Title language-id="en_US">Liferay Digital Solutions Forum UK</Title></root>

summary:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US,it_IT," default-locale="en_US"><Summary language-id="en_US"><p><strong>Discover fresh insights into customer experience from experts who are leading the way.</strong></p>

<p>Customer-centric business is here to stay. How do you address the challenges of creating a unified experience that connects every digital touchpoint? At Liferay Symposium, you'll learn how industry leaders are using a customer-first approach to transform their business. Sessions will focus on digital disruption and strategy, analytics, omnichannel technology, integration, and more. Be the first to see product updates and roadmaps, connect with Liferay chiefs and senior consultants, and learn from the experiences of key clients and partners.</p></Summary><Summary language-id="it_IT"><p><strong>Scopri le novitá relative alla customer Experience direttamente dai leader.</strong></p>

<p>Il business Customer centrico è arrivato per restare. Come affrontare le sfide per creare un'esperienza unica che collega ogni punto di contatto del mondo digitale? Al Liferay Symposium, scoprirai come i leader del settore stanno trasformando il proprio business mettendo al centro di tutto il Cliente. Le sessioni saranno incentrate sulle strategie digitali e la digital disruption, l'analisi, la tecnologia omnichannel, le integrazioni e su molti altri temi di attualitá. Il Liferay Symposium ti permette di essere il primo a vedere gli aggiornamenti di prodotto e le roadmap, di incontrare i manager e gli esperti consulenti Liferay, di conoscere ed imparare dalle esperienze dei clienti e dei partner.</p></Summary></root>
summaryCurrentValue:
Discover fresh insights into customer experience from experts who are leading the way.

Customer-centric business is here to stay. How do you address the challenges of creating a unified experience that connects every digital touchpoint? At Liferay Symposium, you'll learn how industry leaders are using a customer-first approach to transform their business. Sessions will focus on digital disruption and strategy, analytics, omnichannel technology, integration, and more. Be the first to see product updates and roadmaps, connect with Liferay chiefs and senior consultants, and learn from the experiences of key clients and partners.
